name: video-chat
description: A simple WebRTC video chat app (React + Node)

scripts.postinstall: concurrently 'cd frontend && npm install' 'cd backend && npm install'
scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd backend && npm run dev' 'cd frontend && npm start'
scripts.docker:build: concurrently 'cd frontend && npm run docker:build' 'cd backend && npm run docker:build'
